item.title: tex-mex
item.description: Ingredients 1 lb. lean ground beef 1 chopped onion 1 chopped green pepper 1 bay leaf (or two) 28 oz stewed or diced tomatoes 1 can black beans 1 can pinto beans 1 can corn 1.

item.title: Tuscan Vegetable Soup
item.description: Like minestrone soup, but on steroids. Ingredients 1 can cannellini beans 1 Tb olive oil 1/2 large onion, diced (~1 cup) 2 carrots, diced (~1/2 cup) 1 small zucchini, diced 1 clove garlic, minced 1 Tb chopped fresh thyme (or 1 ts dried) 2 Tb chopped fresh sage (or 1 ts dried) 1/2 ts salt 1/4 ts ground pepper 4 cups chicken or veggie broth 14oz diced tomatoes 2oz baby spinach leaves (~2 cups) Instructions Mash half of the beans in a small bowl.
